summary:
The Mona Lisa is a famous painting by Leonardo da Vinci, an Italian artist. It shows a woman named Lisa del Giocondo with a mysterious smile. This painting is super important because it's from the Renaissance period in Italy. People love it for the way Leonardo used colors and shadows to make the picture look so real.

The Mona Lisa was stolen in 1911, which made it even more famous. It was found two years later and is now in the Louvre Museum in Paris, France. It's worth a lot of money, over $1 billion today!
title: Mona Lisa
